author: fern
description:
Check out Displate and use code FERN for a special Black Friday discount https://displate.com/l/fern 
1-2 Displates → 37% off
3-4 Displates → 43% off
5+ Displates → 46% off
*Discounts valid on Textra, not valid on limited edition & Lumino. (ad)

If you want to delve even deeper into the madness of Action Park, be sure to watch the HBO documentary Class Action Park: https://www.classactionpark.com/

Check out Andy Mulvihill's book ‘Action Park’: https://www.amazon.de/-/en/Action-Park-Americas-Dangerous-Amusement/dp/0143134515 

This is the wildest amusement park America has ever built!


Sources: https://docs.google.com/document/d/1U5anz3I2wPkvIDoIzDr6qPFdTx_ARKauF_5lYrIcWY4/edit?usp=sharing

title: The Dumbest Theme Park in History
